text: int main ( ) { int t , arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , r , k , i , j , max = 0 , sum [ 1000 ] = { 0 } ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { sum [ i ] = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & r ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < r ; j ++ ) { max = 0 ; for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ j ] [ k ] ) ; if ( max < arr [ j ] [ k ] ) max = arr [ j ] [ k ] ; } sum [ i ] = max + sum [ i ] ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { printf ( "%d\n" , sum [ i ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
